resources.string: Tells you when your monster has encounted an event.
Please enter a name for your new Monster:
A basic food item. Restores half a heart upon consumption
A food item. Restores a heart upon consumption
A large food item. Restores one and a half a heart upon consumption
Restores one diligence heart upon consumption.
A rare item. Reduces steps needed to evolve by 1000.
Evolve your monster if conditions have been met.
Send your monster off to retirement and start raising a new one.
Are you sure you want to retire your current monster? You will start off with a new egg if you confirm.
Are you sure you want to release this monster? You won\'t be able to get it back if you confirm.
Search for a match for your monster!
Connect and battle with another nearby person\'s monster.
Connect with another person\'s monster and create a new egg. (Caution: will retire your current monster if ranch is full, both players must have an adult stage monster.)
Mufufu, looks like you met a friend. Shall we make this a match? (This will retire your current monster if your ranch is full)
Challenge a nearby player to rock paper scissors. The first one to get 3 points wins!
Hello young soul. I am the matchmaker. Once your monster has grown seek me again so I may find it a suitor.
Hello old soul. I am the matchmaker. Bear your heart to me and I shall find you a suitor. Shall I look for a match for your monster?
I come bearing a match. Do you accept this proposition? (This will retire your current monster if your ranch is full)
A memory game where you must select buttons in the same pattern presented. Earn steps for each round you pass.
Move a chain along to collect blocks and become longer. Earn steps for each block you collect.
Please wait at least 10 seconds for search to finish.
A scorching island in a sea of flames. Monsters that live here have learned to adapt to the extreme heat.
An ancient island full of savage terrain. Dino type monsters can be found here.
An island of coral and sea life. Monsters here are accustomed to living in the sea.
A strange land inhabited by Enigma type monsters. Spirits and strange beings can be found here.
An island that has been overrun with foliage. Monsters here have become one with nature.
An island built out of metal. The lack of organic materials has caused it to be full of machines.
An island covered in dark miasma. Monsters on this island have become one with darkness
An island in the clouds surrounded by light. Monsters here are accustomed to the constant daytime.
An island that is said to have once been in the stars. All the monsters here are celestial beings.
This entry hasn\'t been unlocked yet.
A seemingly basic egg. Contains an enigma type monster.
A prehistoric egg. Contains an ancient type monster.
An aquatic egg. Contains an aquatic type monster.
A fiery egg. Contains a fire type monster.
An egg made out of metal. Contains a machine type monster.
An egg that sprouted from the earth. Contains an earth type monster.
An enigma type monster. Although it is actually a spirit, this monster strangely resembles a raccoon. It will spend most of its time hiding and playing in forests.
An enigma type monster. Some believe it eerily resembles a skull but Researchers have found that they appear to be made of a more brittle material, which is why they often hide from strangers.
An enigma type monster. Folklore mentions this monster as a symbol of wealth and prosperity. Because of this they have been hunted to the point where finding one in the wild is a rarity.
An enigma type monster. Commonly found in forests this monster is very social with those it deems friends.
An enigma type monster. A symbol of the desert. This monster spends a lot of time alone so it becomes startled and unpredictable when something new approaches.
This enigma type monster strangely resembles a sphinx. It spends most of its time lounging around in front of caves and passageways. Only allowing passage to whoever can solve its riddles.
An enigma type monster. It can\'t move its main body so it waits and gazes at the passing world.
A dino type monster. Once it bites onto something it never lets go so watch out!
A dino type monster. As a cold and shy baby it hides inside its egg shell so it can remain warm and comfortable.
A dino type monster. It sleeps for 20 hours a day and only wakes up to eat or when bothered.
Covered in scales, this dino type monster protects itself while bludgeoning enemies with its tail
A dino type monster. A dangerous savage who will attack anything that enters its territory.
An earth type monster. This seemingly simple seed will one day grow up to be a large monster… or at least that\'s what it tells its friends.
An earth type monster. For a long time researchers have wondered if this monster is actually three monsters gathered together or a monster with three heads.
An aqua type monster. Born in a small lake it slowly crawls outside to meet new friends.
An aqua type monster. With its many arms it floats around hoping small prey will get stuck in its tentacles.
This aqua type monster is often mistaken by some cultures as a mythical dragon. It is however actually a type of eel.
When threatened this aqua type monster will expand to try and intimidate the threat. It also expands when happy, which is… confusing.
This aqua type monster stores water in a sac on its back. The water combines with mucus on its skin to produce large bubbles.
This aqua type monster hides in a large bubble made of water. It will keep adding water to its bubble and try and replace any water lost on hot days.
Normally found at the bottom of the ocean, this aqua type monster will come up for air every few days to socialize.
This aqua type monster has no bones. Because of this it floats around hoping smaller creatures get caught in its tentacles.
This aqua type monster spends most of its time relaxing on beaches with its herd. The largest one is in charge of keeping a lookout for threats while the others sleep.
Found on beaches it will use its cute appearance to befriend other monsters and join their group.

According to legend, a carp that could swim upstream and then leap the falls of the Yellow River at Dragon Gate would be transformed into a dragon. Researchers have tossed carp through this gate but it appears that unless a carp makes the journey itself it will not transform.
Because of its fearsome appearance this monster likes to hide in the dark depths of the sea. It will use the light as a lure to draw prey closer before it strikes.
This strange monster has no bones. Because of this it is able to hide and squeeze through tight crevasses on the ocean floor.
This monster uses sensors on its body to detect electric signals from passing organisms to hunt its prey.
The shell on this monster is actually made out of iron, which it will collect on the sea floor over its life. All of its feet are covered in tiny iron scales as well for further protection.
A machine type monster. Originally a simple drilling machine used for construction that has been taken over by an unknown cybernetic organism. Its dream is to drill to the heavens.
A fire type monster. Enjoys sitting around campfires and eating stray embers.
A fire type monster. Some cultures carry totems based on it for good luck and fortune.
This horned monster carries a small fire on its back. This fire is used to regulate its internal temperature.
This fire type monster stores fuel in a sac on its back. The fuel produces strong flames which are expelled constantly.
The shell on its back is actually a miniature volcano. This monster mainly eats stones which are melted in its core to filter out nutrients it can digest.
This ball of fire has obtained sentience through some bizarre accident. Through fear of eventually burning out it will search out smaller flames to consume.
A rare wyrm thought to be a descendant of ancient dragons. Despite having wings it spends most of its time slithering on the ground.
Once a smaller fireball it has managed to consume enough flames that it has become large and complacent.
A mad scientist has combined this monster with a factory. Because of this it now has a large chimney on its back that expels flames from its internal furnace.
In the harsh heat of its environment this monster has been forced to develop fierce instincts to survive.
Indigenous tribes on small islands worship this monster believing it will protect them on fishing trips.
In the extreme heat of the desert this monster can be found. The heat also produces mirages which makes studying it difficult.
Despite its fearsome appearance this monster is quite kind. It will spend most of its time caring for baby monsters. It also guards them so be careful not to get too close.
This monster uses its large ears to detect anything hiding in its surroundings. Flames from its tail let others know not to get too close.
A living being made of coal. The friction from moving causes the coal to ignite which creates the large mane of fire surrounging it.
A spirit that is said to be the embodiment of fire. It contains its energy within the large beads around its neck which can be used to generate all sorts of flames.
With many coals on its back this monster constantly generates heat. It is very popular in hot springs.
An egg shrouded in darkness. Contains a dark type monster.
An egg that has descended from the heavens. Contains a light type monster.
An egg that was found among the stars. Contains a cosmic type monster.
A monster made up of bright stardust. Enjoys spending time with others.
A monster made up of dark stardust. Likes to be alone.
